channel.title: Comunistando — Feed Geral
channel.description: Breaking News do mundo socialista (feed geral)

item.title: Education, health fees among key concerns
item.description: China to legislate on preschool education

item.title: Education, health fees among key concerns
item.description: China to legislate on preschool education

item.title: International group praises green revival
item.description: A high-level international advisory body applauded China's efforts to improve the environment and suggested a 15-year strategy against pollution in a draft recommendation report on Monday.

item.title: Krasnodar Court Freezes Bank Accounts of Companies Linked to Black Sea Oil Spill
item.description: Rosprirodnadzor is seeking $614 million in damages from the two companies over the December 2024 oil spill off the coast of the Krasnodar region.

item.title: Russia Delays Moon and Venus Missions Again
item.description: Luna-26 is planned to launch in 2028, while the Venus mission, previously rescheduled for the 2034-35 window, will now slip to 2036.

item.title: Lavrov Says ‘No Meeting Planned’ Between Putin and Zelensky
item.description: The foreign minister’s remarks on Meet the Press were the latest and clearest indication that a Putin-Zelensky summit is nowhere on the horizon.

item.title: Liberan a salvadoreño deportado por error y devuelto a EEUU
item.description: Washington, 22 ago (Prensa Latina) El inmigrante salvadoreño Kilmar Abrego García, a quien deportaron por error en marzo antes de ser devuelto a Estados Unidos, fue liberado hoy de la custodia penal en Tennessee y se dirige a Maryland, donde reside. The post L

item.title: Solo 47 de 196 países confirman asistencia a COP30 en Brasil
item.description: Brasilia, 22 ago (Prensa Latina) Solo 47 de 196 países participantes confirmaron hasta hoy su asistencia y reservaron alojamiento para la Conferencia de Naciones Unidas sobre el Clima (COP30) que se realizará en noviembre en Belém, capital del norteño estado b

item.title: Embajadora china en Panamá llama a EEUU a respetar relaciones
item.description: Ciudad de Panamá, 22 ago (Prensa Latina) La embajadora de China en Panamá, Xu Xueyuan, llamó hoy a su par de Estados Unidos, Kevin Cabrera, a respetar las relaciones de cooperación y suspender los enfrentamientos. The post Embajadora china en Panamá llama a EE

item.title: Lao Foreign Minister Pays Courtesy Call on Mongolian Prime Minister
item.description: (KPL) As part of his official visit to Mongolia and participation in the 10th Foreign Ministers’ Meeting of the Forum for East Asia–Latin America Cooperation (FEALAC) on August 21, Foreign Minister of the Lao PDR Thongsavanh Phomvihane and his delegation paid
